Building Self-Efficacy 

Self-efficacy is our individual beliefs that we can achieve our goals. People who have high levels of self-efficacy exert sufficient energy to achieve their goals. In contrast, people with low self-efficacy tend to give up! 

#GOALS

there's a general point here about what statistical significance means

the efficacy studies on J&J used a one dose protocol but not because their null hypothesis was that this was the best protocol
